text: they've divided medical opinion some
experts argue a cigarette help smoker
switch from more harmful tobacco
cigarettes but just this week the World
Health Organization called for them to
be banned indoors but just how harmful
are e cigarettes we put that to the test
in Newcastle well I bought some down the
market I've also got a couple from shops
nearby but I'm not about to have a binge
of vaping I'm actually going to take
these to a lab to see what's really in
them we tested four different brands in
total at this lab in Leeds three were
fine but one a liquid contained diacetyl
a chemical which is safe to eat but is
not safe to inhale it's linked to a
serious lung disease well that
particular chemical is associated with
an unusual but well-established lung
condition called popcorn workers lung
and and it has been inhaled in
significant quantities in people who
worked in popcorn manufacturing
factories and in those individuals it's
caused very serious lung condition
serious enough to warrant one
transplantation we bought the e-liquid
containing diacetyl the butterscotch
flavor here in the VIP shop in gay Ted's
Metro Centre the IP is one of the UK's
biggest a cigarette brands we contacted
VIP they told us they did know about
this issue after discovering the
chemical through their own testing
procedures we're very disappointed that
you actually was able to buy one as we
had done a withdrawal of the product a
week or so beforehand
sadly in the store that you actually
purchase it from there was a change of
store management and we've implemented
now that and the product has been
completely withdrawn well you would
resume because you knew was harmful
we withdrew it yes and because of the
small amount that the vapor would
actually consume as such it was seemed
at in the short term there would be no
health concerns long-term yes it could
well be however we decided it was a
withdrawal rather than a recall of the
product and this is our very very first
issue in five years and we actually sell
millions of bottles a year we are very
sorry it's happened we're investigating
how it has happened we've taken this
exceedingly serious you happen to find
that particular chemical in that
particular product but there are
thousands of products
then heck knows what's in everything
else VIP butterscotch eliquid is no
longer available to buy Chris Jackson
BBC News Newcastle
